definition: ضهى III to be similar, alike, or corresponding; to resemble (ه s.o. هـ s.th.), be like s.o. or s.th. (هـ, ه), correspond (ه to s.o., هـ to s.th.); to compare (على, ب هـ s.th. with; بين -- وبين two things); to imitate (ب s.o., s.th.) ضهى ḍahān O menopause, climacteric 546 ضهى ḍaīy similar, (a)like, corresponding, analogous
